summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6165 for the improvement of 56th Avenue Southwest and 57th Avenue Southwest, each from West Bradford Street to West Charlestown Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 86374, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
